short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Price Tracker: don't miss any special offers of any selected product
short.fr: Price Tracker : ne manquez aucune offre spéciale sur un produit sélectionné

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Aliexpress price tracker helps you to track prices on aliexpress. Get alarms when price is down.
This is made so easy and simple.Get notification for price reduction of every product.Aliexpress price tracker help you to track every product.

▬▬▬▬ GETTING STARTED ▬▬▬▬▬

1. Install the extension by clicking the “Add to chrome” button.
2. Open an AliExpress product page.
3. Click on the Bell buttons for tracking
Thats It.

Thank you.
After using this  tool, feel free to give us a 5 star rating!
